ygData.subject: Re: Time for another Sylly Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: ... sure) ... otherwise (also soon to be replaced by Barney) ... beer!) ... usually down to boxers and a t-shirt ... Nice survey Sylly! Hehe Weiland
ygData.messageBody:
>
> As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
> character so...
>
> When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:
>
> Day of the week to play: The day the baby and her mother go to Grandma's
>
> Time of day: Any time between feedings
>
> Longest stretch of continuous play: 18 hours (I need to get out more)
>
> Way to have game sounds: Low (grumble) my office is also the nursery
>
> Distance to sit from display: 3 feet
>
> TV show to have on: Luckily nothing (soon to be replaced by Barney I'm
sure)
>
> Music to listen to: Braveheart Soundtrack if I feel RPish Soundgarden
otherwise (also soon to be replaced by Barney)
>
> Beverage (non-alcoholic): Huh?
>
> Beverage (alcoholic): Guiness (If you can see through it its not good
beer!)
>
> Health Food: Cheddar Cheese Goldfish
>
> Junk Food: Cheedar Cheese Goldfish left in the bowl from the night before
>
> Clothes to wear: Start off fully clothed, by about the 3rd hour I'm
usually down to boxers and a t-shirt
>

Nice survey Sylly! Hehe

Weiland <Disciples of Truth>
Erollisi Marr
